column4: if I understand you correctly you are running a command line program, you have done (for example) 'cd /home/dwerf' and you are seeing something on the screen that makes you think it is broken - please put the output of 'cd /home/username' into  pastebin.ubuntulinux.nl and then tell us the URL
what program are you using for this action?
have a look at this it is a set of answers - from IBM and others via google http://tinyurl.com/9wfb3
